item.description:
Registration starts at 9:30 p.m. and continues all day

Represent TOSOB and wear your Steppin Tee Shirt

Runners and Walkers for the race competition  starts at 10:am

There will be food, games and races

Different age groups willcompete against each other

All proceeds go to supporting services for children and adults with autism

Our very own Joni Spicer sits on this board

 

The Run/Walk is approximately 2.5 miles

What to do:

1. Ask friends and family members to sponsor you per mile or give a flat donation

2. Have sponsors write in name , address, and amount pledged and collected.

3.Collect pledge money from your sponsors.

4.Make checks and money orders payable to Garrett Pressley Autism Resource Center

 MEDIA SPONSOR
item.how_to_find_us: The Garrett Pressley Autism Resourcs Center's Sixth Annual Road Race

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Stepper's Community Service Road Race
